name: Prosperous Peace
effect: Restores 40% of Max HP and an additional 2,350 HP to the selected character.
description: Ganyu's specialty. The image of a resting qilin is by itself enough to calm a person down. Ganyu has put her well-wishes for all that is lovely in this world into this dish â€” and she's saved some of her favorite Qingxin Flowers just for you, too.
